name: Space Hulk: Tactics
description: Space Hulk: Tactics is a faithful adaptation of the board game Space Hulk, set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, bringing a unique twist to the cult classic formula. Engage in bloody battles as either a squad of Terminator Space Marines or the deadly alien Genestealers.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.3 GHz)/AMD FX-4200 (3.3 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon R7 370 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION AND ONLINE GAME
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K (3.5 GHz)/AMD FX-8300 (3.3 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 960/Radeon R9 380 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION AND ONLINE GAME
